packages.name: com.maskedkitten.musicshuffling
packages.description: Little music shuffling package, multiple songs and cooldown between songs.
packages.author: MaskedKitten

packages.name: com.maskedkitten.advancedenabledisable
packages.description: Basically a enable disable script with a bunch of features to enable or disable something.
packages.author: MaskedKitten

packages.name: com.maskedkitten.bpmbounce
packages.description: A script that makes your text bounce to a certain BPM.
packages.author: MaskedKitten

packages.name: com.maskedkitten.3dshader
packages.description: A shader that makes textures 3D! Make sure to use displacement maps to use this, and put it under HeightMap.
packages.author: MaskedKitten
